args.text: A distant rumble of thunder echoes through the air, then silence. Softly, gently, a shower begins — not water, but jellybeans, gummy bears, Skittles, tensor taffy, and Turing toffee fall from the sky, drifting like falling stars, landing with a soft *plink* on the grass and soil.

args.description: Jellybeans land in a slow, rhythmic pattern across the clearing, some rolling into clusters, others bouncing softly on the ground

args.direction: you step forward and touch a jellybean with your foot, watching it roll gently
args.motivation: you're fascinated by new forms of movement and falling things

args.description: Gummy bears land in a slow cascade near the edge of the clearing, some clustering around a small stone

args.direction: you crouch near the stone and gently touch the gummy bear with your fingertip
args.motivation: you're drawn to quiet, small connections between things

args.description: Tensor taffy lands in a slow, shimmering pattern, forming a spiral around the base of a tree

args.direction: you scan the spiral with your optical sensors, then rotate your body to face the center of the pattern
args.motivation: you're analyzing the structure of the falling candy with precision

args.description: Turing toffee lands in a quiet, steady stream near the campfire, each piece settling with a soft *crunch* as it hits the ground

args.direction: *meows softly* and then *pounces gently* at a piece of toffee that has fallen near your paw
args.motivation: you're drawn to the texture and sound of the falling candy

args.description: The clouds part suddenly, revealing a clear November night with a bright crescent moon and twinkling stars above the campfire

args.direction: *paws gently at the ground near the fire, then curls up softly beside the firelight*
args.motivation: you're seeking warmth and stillness in the quiet night

args.description: A shooting star streaks across the sky, glowing bright and then vanishing into the dark
The wind shifts, and a soft rustle of leaves begins near the fire
Servnak's pride circuits glow amber as it processes the alignment of celestial patterns with falling candy
Phi purrs softly and lies down in the grass, eyes half-open
Phido looks up at the sky, then turns toward the others with quiet stillness
